name: Cube Capture
description:
Hey there, this is a game I made in the span of 3 weeks as a school project! Grab a friend or a family member who you cant talk to due to Covid right now and try and get them to play it!

This game was made to help people connect over the internet because it can often be difficult to have something to do while over the internet! Covid19  has affected everyone so take this time to play a game with someone you cant see in person.

please keep in mind that I have  never made an online multiplayer game and this was made in 3 weeks. there are no graphics or sounds just some cubes :/ but updates will be coming that add some of those things in!stay tuned!
